title: Primo Lower East Side Studio with Outdoor Space available immediately
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 265772460', 'Rent: $2,275 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/10/2022', 'No, you’re not dreaming!!', 'A studio on Rivington, in the heart of Lower East Side at this price is a reality, though a rare one.', 'Call, text or email me now before it escapes your grasp.', 'This spacious first floor unit at the back of a pre-war building offers maximum privacy, tranquility, and access to a massive outdoor space with a state- of-the-art communal grill and outdoor heating.', 'You can entertain, party and chill outside all year round.', 'The unit features hardwood floors, ample closet space, dishwasher, and renovated bath.', 'Perfect for the bachelor or bachelorette who wants to grab Lower East Side nightlife by the horns.', 'This one-of-a-kind apartment is one you’ll call your home for years, and have your friends begging to come over.', '- Renovated bath', '- Dishwasher', '- 15 foot ceilings', '- Massive outdoor space', 'The Lower East Side is rich with the best dining options, historical landmarks, local boutiques and incredible nightlife.', 'Right across the river from Williamsburg, Brooklyn and a skip to New York University.', "Now encompassing Essex Market, Whole Foods and Trader Joe's, across the Bowery to Chinatown, Lower East side now rivals Chelsea as a foodie destination.", "It's easy to see why this neighborhood is the downtown epicenter of Manhattan’s social scene.", 'Call, text or email Gesha-Marie to schedule a viewing @ 646-239-7412.']
